con:config.script:
String startDate =(new Date() + 10).format("yyyy-MM-dd").toUpperCase() log.info(startDate)
String endDate =(new Date() + 12).format("yyyy-MM-dd").toUpperCase() log.info(endDate)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue( "startDate", startDate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue( "endDate", endDate)

Type="CAPTION">true</Info> </AdditionalInfo> <Languages> <Language Code="EN"/> </Languages> </MediaRef> </HotelContentRef> </SearchCriteria> </GetHotelDetailsRQ> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

valueType="String" EncodingType="wsse:Base64Binary">${#Project#tokenString}</wsse:BinarySecurityToken> </wsse:Security> </SOAP-ENV:Header> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <pnrb:UpdateReservationRQ Version="1.19.0" xmlns:pnrb="http://webservices.sabre.com/pnrbuilder/v1_19" xmlns:or="http://services.sabre.com/res/or/v1_14"> <pnrb:RequestType initialIgnore="true" commitTransaction="false">Stateful</pnrb:RequestType> <pnrb:ReturnOptions RetrievePNR="true"/> <pnrb:ReservationUpdateList> <pnrb:ReservationUpdateItem UpdateId="100"> <pnrb:PassengerNameUpdate op="C"> <pnrb:TravelerName> <pnrb:Given>SABRE</pnrb:Given> <pnrb:Surname>TEST</pnrb:Surname> </pnrb:TravelerName> </pnrb:PassengerNameUpdate> </pnrb:ReservationUpdateItem> <pnrb:ReservationUpdateItem UpdateId="200"> <pnrb:PhoneNumberUpdate op="C"> <pnrb:PhoneText>111111</pnrb:PhoneText> </pnrb:PhoneNumberUpdate> </pnrb:ReservationUpdateItem> <pnrb:ReservationUpdateItem UpdateId="ID_2"> <pnrb:ProductUpdate op="C" id="1"> <pnrb:Product> <or:ProductDetails> <or:ProductName type="HHL">Lodging</or:ProductName> <or:Lodging> <or:ResGlobalInfo> <or:BookingInfo RequestorID="SG11111" CorpDiscount="CD1234567" PromotionalCode="XJKGHLDE" Email="test@sabre.com"> <or:BookingKey>${#Project#BookingKey}</or:BookingKey> <or:HotelReservationIds> <or:HotelReservation Id="PNR12345" Type="24"/> </or:HotelReservationIds> </or:BookingInfo> <or:HotelInfo HotelCode="hotelCode" HotelName="hotelName"> <or:LocationInfo> <or:Contact Fax="+441614453941"/> </or:LocationInfo> </or:HotelInfo> <or:StayDateRange StartDate="2019-04-10" EndDate="2019-04-15"/> <or:Total AmountAfterTax="1000.00" CurrencyCode="USD"/> </or:ResGlobalInfo> <or:Rooms> <or:Room NonSmoking="true" BedTypeCode="5" AccessibilityInformation="1" RoomIndex="1" SegmentNumber="1"> <or:Guests> <or:Guest Title="Mr" FirstName="BOOKING" LastName="TEST" Email="test@sabre.com" Type="10" Age="30" Index="1"
